resources.string:
My name is Bangling Yin, you can call me Bonnie, and I am a graduate student at Pace University. My undergraduate degree is in Marketing, and I had no prior experience with coding before. Last semester, I took an "Introduction to Java" course, which served as my first exposure to programming. Although I am still not very proficient, I am eager to learn more.
I am particularly interested in mobile application development. However, I am aware that I lack background knowledge and experience in this area, which may pose challenges. Nonetheless, I believe in my ability to overcome these obstacles with perseverance.
I hope to receive support from both my instructors and classmates throughout this semester. I am committed to putting in the effort and dedication required to learn and grow in this field.
Thank you for the opportunity, and I look forward to collaborating with you all.
My hobbies are riding and travelling.
